Summary An impactful and visionary Product Owner with experience from large corporations to early startups adept in conceiving, defining, developing, & launching Mobile Web & native applications.  
 
More than 13+ years of experience in building System software, Middleware, eCommerce and Mobile platform/apps. Thought leadership in all stages of technology design, development, execution in support of a product vision and roadmap. Responsible for hiring key technical staff and creating technology organizations from ground up and kick-start new initiatives to implement successful software products and services.  
 
Experienced in delivering large complex enterprise releases across Mobile, Database development, Business Analytics, J2EE applications, SOA platforms, eCommerce and Social Media. Experienced in owning product, developing product strategy, aligning product and engineering to the organization’s goal. Participated in technical due-diligence for acquisitions. Established strong cross-organizational partnerships by working closely with product management, sales and support. 
 
Specialties:  
- Leadership/Management, Business Analysis, SDLC, PMO, Industry best practices. 
- Designing, Architecting & Building products 
- Android, iOS, Blackberry, Cocos2D, Windows, Marmalade, Unity, PhoneGap 
- Java, J2EE, ObjectiveC, AngularJS 
- NoSQL( Cassandra, MongoDB), Hadoop, Big Data, Restlet, Spring, Hibernate 
- Clustering & load-balancing, Sphinx, Lucene, Solr, Workflow/Rules Engine. 
- Speaker in Android Developer Conference 2012 (http://www.andevcon.com/AndevCon_III/index.html) Summary An impactful and visionary Product Owner with experience from large corporations to early startups adept in conceiving, defining, developing, & launching Mobile Web & native applications.

- Speaker in Android Developer Conference 2012 (http://www.andevcon.com/AndevCon_III/index.html) Experience Director of Engineering IAB May 2015  – Present (4 months) Greater New York City Area Co-Founder STEAMS - Your Anonymous Voice! January 2014  – Present (1 year 8 months) Greater New York City Area Web - http://stea.ms 
iOS - https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/steams-your-anonymous-voice!/id687194925?mt=8 
Android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.moxilogy.steams&hl=en 
 
STEAMS is 100% anonymous social network that lets you express your voices and concerns in a very creative and beautiful way via a story, picture, video, or picture meme. By posting on Steams, you can bring these issues out in open and let everyone see the reality and who knows your support might help eliminate the cause of the steam.  
 
• ANONYMOUS: 100% anonymous, we don't need your email, your contacts, phone number etc.  
• NO SIGN UP: Just install and start using the app! NO SIGN UP process! 
• FAST: Design to rapidly take a picture or shoot a creative 8 seconds video and upload 
• VIDEO: Recording video is so simple and fun. Pause and record multiple clips into one video using a very simple interface. Give it a try, you will love it! 
• STORIES: Write down your thoughts as text and add images as background 
• MEMES: Write on the picture using beautiful and impactful fonts and create the best MEMEs (for the creative you) 
• DISCOVER: Look up Steams based on recent, popularity and your location 
• SOCIAL: Share on Facebook, Twitter and Tumblr (specially when you find something funny or interesting) Mobile Product Manager Yieldmo September 2014  –  April 2015  (8 months) Greater New York City Area Yieldmo is saving the world from bad mobile ads. We think ads should look great and work great. We combine the best of design and data to invent new formats, ruthlessly optimize them, and deliver unprecedented results. http://adformatlab.yieldmo.com/ 
 
Yieldmo is a mobile advertising that optimizes revenue for publishers, ROI for marketers, and the ad-viewing experience for users. Yieldmo's Private Mobile Marketplace enables marketers to purchase high quality non-banner ad inventory in Yieldmo's patent-pending, consumer-friendly ad formats on the mobile pages and apps of premium publishers. Director - Integrations Flurry, Inc. March 2013  –  September 2014  (1 year 7 months) greater new york city area Establish processes among the companies and with independent developers to integrate Flurry technology platform easily and quickly. Build and guide team of developers in developing tools, write and deploy applications using Flurry services/products and sample apps to facilitate integrations for our high-value partners and the mobile community. Plan, manage, and execute projects and defining strategy and vision for developer engagement ensuring Flurry services are well understood and used in tandem for maximum benefit to current and future Flurry partners. Interface with partners in person and on the phone to facilitate a successful partnership. Work with engineering, operations and customer service. Coordinate functions across all departments to include Marketing, Business Development, Sales, Product Management and Engineering teams to prioritize, resolve and communicate status of issues and opportunities. Troubleshoot, optimize, and performance tune production systems as necessary. 
 
Flurry product and services are used by leading companies like Rovio (Angry Birds), Zynga, The New York Times, Electronic Arts, Skype, Groupon, eBay, Capcom, MTV and CBS, as well as tens of thousands of indies. Director Development - Mobile appssavvy January 2011  –  February 2013  (2 years 2 months) Lead overall product/technical direction for mobile products at appssavvy. Focused on investigating, innovating, designing and executing solutions to make it easier for Ads to run on mobile platform. Work closely with product & creative department in developing ideas and solutions to meet publisher business goals. Establish standards, protocols and best practices, and communicate internal technology initiatives. Keep up-to-date with the latest innovations in mobile technology – from new platforms and services to cutting edge tools and libraries. 
 
The appssavvy "adtivity" Mobile SDK enables mobile publishers on iOS, including iPhone and iPad, and Android platforms, to unlock and create new, display advertising opportunities reaching people as they perform activities on smartphones and tablets. 
The adtivity Mobile SDK is designed to integrate directly into activities performed on publishers’ mobile apps. Unlike traditional mobile banners, adtivity is attached to the event of performing an activity, which include sharing content and photos, checking-in and setting statuses, collecting, sending and earning virtual goods, polls and contests, and completing a level within a game, to name a few. 
Activity-based display ads through the adtivity Mobile SDK are large format and framed by the mobile publisher to bring context and to match the style of the app. 
 
The SDK is now used by publishers like Disney and social-gaming companies CrowdStar, OMGPOP, Meez, Big Blue Bubble and Arkadium. Brand advertisers including American Express, Chase, Coca-Cola etc. Technical Project Manager KickApps Corporation May 2010  –  January 2011  (9 months) Responsible for the architecture and development of backend systems and services for the KickApps platform (a socially-enabling software-as-a-service platform). Backend services include the intake and retrieval of user-generated content such as photos, audio, and video; systems to tag, rate, and review uploaded content; commenting and messaging systems; and the management of users, relationships and activities.  
Responsible for modernizing the development and release processes. Work closely with executive leadership to prioritize initiatives and resources. Provided guidance for new product initiatives/features, customer support and professional services issues, network operations scale out, maintain high availability, quality & performance of the KickApps platform application suite which includes social networking, media sharing & user-generated content (photos, video, audio files and blogs), Social Video (custom video players, video management system and video advertising), comments and ratings, content management systems (CMS), member management, message boards, Q&A portals. Software Development Manager AIT Global Inc. June 2006  –  April 2010  (3 years 11 months) Coordinated a development process with group members in three time zones.Participated in use case development, performed business analysis, defined process/methodologies and source configuration control for various industrial customers including financial, insurance, media, educational, SCM and pharmaceutical companies. Developed training material and led several training sessions on the added features to all levels of employees ranging from analysts to executives.  
Researched and developed methodologies, process, requirement gathering techniques/tools, and test scenarios for various projects. Conducted a technical assessment and created a prototype for a multi-user business simulation. Set up a multicast server and conducted several streaming media tests to determine performance. Setup the EAI, ESB, Web Services, Messaging, High Available and Clustering systems for various clients and projects. Worked on Mobile Development iPhone & Android. Business Rules Consultant IBM January 2005  –  June 2006  (1 year 6 months) Designed and implemented JRules infrastructure by wrapping up core JRules API, caching RuleSet(s), Rules analysis, Rules Definition, Rules configuration, Rule lifecycle. Developed the interface between the application and ILOG (JRules). Team expert in developing business rules for multiple application contexts. Technical Manager AIT Technologies Inc. January 2003  –  January 2005  (2 years 1 month) Software Engineer Tata Consultancy Services June 2001  –  December 2002  (1 year 7 months) Director of Engineering IAB May 2015  – Present (4 months) Greater New York City Area Director of Engineering IAB May 2015  – Present (4 months) Greater New York City Area Co-Founder STEAMS - Your Anonymous Voice! January 2014  – Present (1 year 8 months) Greater New York City Area Web - http://stea.ms

Android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.moxilogy.steams&hl=en
